quote_last: the overseer arrived and told them he had no jobs for them.
title: A Clergyman's Daughter
author: George Orwell

quote_last: when I got there, time for lunch, so I had it. The food was awful. But it would go on the expense account, and after I’d eaten I got out my notebook and put it down. Lunch $1.50. Taxi $1.00.
title: The Big Clock
author: Kenneth Fearing
